description:
Okinawa`s isolated island of Iwado has seen a growing movement advocating a return to an autonomous government. http://anidb.net/ch40360 [Fukai Ao], a 13-year-old boy with a missing father, lives on the island with an old doctor named http://anidb.net/ch42354 [Toshio] and is about to enter middle school. Ao`s mother was taken away a decade ago by unknown individuals. http://anidb.net/ch40359 [Arata Naru], Ao`s 13-year-old childhood friend, lives with her father, older sister, and grandmother. She has a Yuta power awakened within her due to an incident when she was young.
A mysterious entity called Secret suddenly appears and launches an attack on the Scub Coral life form on the island. In his fervent desire to protect the island, Ao launches a military FP called http://anidb.net/ch2959 [Nirvash] aboard a Japanese military transport.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Ao is one day away from starting middle school when his world begins to change. Scub Coral activity leads to Scub Bursts and mysterious G-Monsters. And when he picks up an odd bracelet, he finds himself drawn even deeper into these events.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ボーン・スリッピー (deep blue)

REGULAR.description:
Fiercely adamant about not relinquishing the bracelet, Ao finds himself trying to pilot the Japan Armed Forces` military Flying Platform to fight the G-Monster and defend the island.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Call It What You Want (AO`s Cavern)
コール・イット・ホワット・ユー・ウォント (AO`s cavern)

REGULAR.description:
Ao has always faced discrimination as a foreigner, but his newly revealed blue hair and involvement in the recent crisis spur the islanders to take action against him. And in the process, Ao learns more about his mother.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スティル・ファイティング (secret operation)

REGULAR.description:
With renewed resolve to fight to protect the island, Ao takes on the G-Monster with some help. And in the aftermath, Ao begins to learn that the world is more complicated than he had thought.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ウォーク・ディス・ウェイ (plant coral)

REGULAR.description:
Having thrown in his lot with Generation Bleu, Ao returns with Team Pied Piper to their headquarters in Switzerland. There, he finds himself out of his element and struggling to figure out how he fits in to their plans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: タイトゥン・アップ (generation bleu)

REGULAR.description:
Ao gets a taste of what it`s like to be part of a real mission and a better sense of just how high the stakes are.  Meanwhile, strange things are happening around the world, apparently driven by one mysterious individual.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ライト・マイ・ファイアー (noblesse oblige)

REGULAR.description:
As this mysterious Truth wreaks havoc at Generation Bleu HQ, his motivations remain enigmatic, but they seem to have something to do with the Nirvash. And by extension, as Nirvash`s pilot, with Ao.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: No One Is Innocent (Bye Bye Angel)
ノー・ワン・イズ・イノセント (bye bye angel)

REGULAR.description:
Ao discovers how duplicitous adults can be and, along with Fleur, he rebels in his own way to stay true to what he believes is right.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: One Nation Under a Groove (Blue Thunder)
ワン・ネイション・アンダー・ア・グルーヴ (blue thunder)

REGULAR.description:
Having failed to obtain the Nirvash for their own use, Japan goes forward with a dangerous experiment to create a Coral plant for themselves. Generation Bleu sends Ao`s team to stop them at all costs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In The Dark We Live (Enemy Below)
イン・ザ・ダーク・ウィー・リヴ (enemy below)

REGULAR.description:
A Scub Burst occurs in the state of Arizona. Political complications keep Pied Piper on the sidelines while Truth`s meddling creates a dangerous situation for Ao and Ivica.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Release Yourself (The Pied Piper of Hamelin)
リリース・ユア・セルフ (the pied piper of Hamelin)

REGULAR.description:
Pied Piper runs into an unusual situation where there is a confirmed Scub Burst, but no Secret in sight. They collect the Quartz and that seems to be the end of it, but strange things start to happen when they return to base.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Plateaux of Mirror (Mirror of the World)
プラトー・オブ・ミラー (mirror of the world)

REGULAR.description:
Pied Piper goes up into space to take care of a Secret that presents a threat to the satellites orbiting around Earth. As the mission unfolds, there are startling revelations in store for Ao.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Step into a World (Heaven and Earth)
ステップ・イントゥ・ア・ワールド (heaven and earth)

REGULAR.description:
Bobbing in the ocean in the Gekko, Ao faces a strange reunion with Eureka. At the same time, the Allied Forces, Japan, Generation Bleu, and Truth close in on the prize - Eureka, her Nirvash, and the Gekko.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シーズ・ア・レインボウ (moonlight ship)

REGULAR.description:
As Eureka and Ao fight against Truth, the JAF and Generation Bleu become embroiled as well. The fallout of this military encounter is further complicated by Naru`s mysterious return.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スターファイアー (another truth)

REGULAR.description:
Ao feels the pressure of being the only IFO pilot with an operational Third Engine. With what Eureka said to him and the Japanese claiming to have communicated with a Secret, he also struggles with the idea that the Secrets may not be the enemy.
Source: crunchyroll

Ao still feels conflicted about fighting Secrets, but with a swarm of Secrets descending on all the Scub Corals that have become active again, an ambitious operation is set in motion to eradicate all the Secrets at once.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガーディアンズ・ハンマー (next phase)

REGULAR.description:
After his desperate stand against the swarm of Secrets, Ao finds himself in a world that is familiar, yet different in disturbing ways. As he tries to figure out what happened and how he might fix it, he makes a startling move.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ラ・ヴィアン・ローズ (Johansson`s book)

REGULAR.description:
With Ao gone, Fleur and Elena are left to confront their differences over how they deal with the way he left. But no matter how they feel, the only way either of them can go to him is by activating the Third Engines on their IFOs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドント・ルック・ダウン (third engine)

REGULAR.description:
The world has turned against Generation Bleu for taking back Ao and the Quartz Gun. They now find themselves facing UN sanctions and the Allied Forces, even as they try to figure out who`s side to take - the Secrets or the Scub Corals.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: メイビー・トゥモロー (the day)

REGULAR.description:
With Blanc gone and the Generation Bleu Headquarters beseiged by the Allied Forces, Ao and the others must figure out what they believe in and whether it`s worth fighting for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ベター・デイズ・アヘッド (last message)

REGULAR.description:
Team Pied Piper works with Japan and the Secrets to hold up their end of the agreement that Blanc forged before he died. And Elena, now with the Allied Forces, struggles to come to terms with her true identity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ワールド・トゥ・ワールド (rising sun)

REGULAR.description:
The confrontation with Truth brings to light new truths about him and the strange IFO-like craft called the Canon that is now a part of him.  And these inconvenient truths begin to change things for Naru and for the Allied Forces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ギャラクシー・トゥ・ギャラクシー (coral carriers)

REGULAR.description:
The complicated relationship between Ao, Naru, and Truth comes to a head. As they try to sort things out, a stranger appears and he seems to have some uncanny knowledge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ザ・ファイナル・フロンティア

REGULAR.description:
Together with his father for the first time, Ao has many questions for Renton. As the heartbreaking answers are revealed, Ao makes his choice.
Source: crunchyroll

PROMOTION.description: PV using footage from the Eureka Seven TV Series

titles.title: スペシャルイントロダクション
